skills.name: Elemental Hit
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing elemental damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Fire-converted Ele Hit with Combat Focus jewels. Massive single hits with great clear.

skills.name: Kinetic Blast
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Wand skill that explodes on terrain for massive AoE. Use Power Siphon for single target.

skills.name: Tornado Shot
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Fire an arrow that releases secondary projectiles. Requires heavy investment but clears entire screens.

skills.name: Ice Shot
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing cold damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Pierce through enemies with freezing arrows. Herald of Ice chains explosions for satisfying clear.

skills.name: Lightning Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing lightning damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Lightning bow skill with inherent chain. Excellent clear with shocking proliferation.

skills.name: Power Siphon
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Power Siphon for single target, Kinetic Blast for clear. Generates power charges for crit.

skills.name: Toxic Rain
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Extra projectiles from Deadeye make for denser pod coverage. Mirage Archer helps with clear.

skills.name: Split Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Simple bow skill that fires multiple arrows. Good league starter before transitioning.

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Area attack that rains arrows. Good clear with no aim required.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Fire multiple arrows in sequence. Excellent single target DPS for bossing.

skills.name: Shrapnel Ballista
skills.description: A totem build that places shrapnel ballista totems to deal damage automatically.
skills.gameplay: Place ballista totems that fire shrapnel. Scale with dexterity for more totems.

skills.name: Spectral Throw
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing elemental damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Classic returning projectile skill. Requires heavy investment but nostalgic.

skills.name: Poisonous Concoction
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Throw poison flasks without needing a weapon. Build up Plague Bearer then unleash. Great league starter.

skills.name: Toxic Rain
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Fire TR pods that slow and deal chaos DoT. Flask uptime is permanent thanks to Pathfinder. Great for all content.

skills.name: Viper Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on chaos damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Strike build that stacks poisons rapidly. Uses claws for fast attacks and poison proliferation.

skills.name: Plague Bearer
skills.description: An aura-based build providing chaos damage through buffs.
skills.gameplay: Maximize Plague Bearer damage for autopilot mapping. Charge up with poison skills then run through packs.

skills.name: Caustic Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Creates chaos DoT ground. Simple and effective for league start.

skills.name: Scourge Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Channel to create poison pods. Release for big poison burst. High skill ceiling.

skills.name: Toxic Rain
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Speed-focused TR with permanent Onslaught and Phasing. Great mapper with high evasion and dodge.

skills.name: Elemental Hit
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing elemental damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Speed-focused Ele Hit with permanent Onslaught and Phasing. Stack frenzy charges for more damage.

skills.name: Lightning Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on lightning damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Melee strike that releases lightning projectiles. Can clear from range or hit bosses in melee.

skills.name: Frost Blades
skills.description: A melee build focusing on cold damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Strike that releases cold projectiles. Great clear with chain. Shatter effects everywhere.

skills.name: Flicker Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Teleport between enemies uncontrollably. Fun but chaotic. Need frenzy sustain.

skills.name: Wild Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on elemental damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Random element attack each hit. Fun but inconsistent. Trinity support helps.

skills.name: Tornado Shot
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing cold damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Cold conversion bow build with excellent clear. Barkskin provides strong defenses. Use Barrage for single target.

skills.name: Lightning Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing lightning damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Lightning bow build with screen-wide clear. Barkskin defense plus evasion makes it tanky for a bow build.

skills.name: Ice Shot
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing cold damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Cold bow build that freezes and shatters packs. Great synergy with Warden cold bonuses.

skills.name: Elemental Hit
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing elemental damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Fire-converted Ele Hit with massive single target damage. Warden provides defensive layers for squishy bow build.

skills.name: Splitting Steel
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Impale steel skills with strong single target. Barkskin helps survive tough encounters.

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Simple bow starter that covers the screen. Puncture for single target bleed.

skills.name: Caustic Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Chaos DoT bow build with excellent clear. Very budget friendly league starter.

skills.name: Scourge Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Channeled poison bow that shotguns with thorns. Good boss damage with proper positioning.

skills.name: Summon Raging Spirit
skills.description: A summoner build that commands spirits to fight for you.
skills.gameplay: Spam SRS skulls that swarm enemies. Minion Instability makes them explode for ignite. Very league start friendly.

skills.name: Summon Skeletons
skills.description: A summoner build that commands skeletons to fight for you.
skills.gameplay: Summon skeletons that demolish bosses. Use Dead Reckoning for Skeleton Mages if preferred. Very tanky playstyle.

skills.name: Detonate Dead
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Corpse-focused DD with enhanced corpse creation. Plaguebringer provides huge damage boost when consuming corpses.

skills.name: Raise Zombie
skills.description: A summoner build that commands zombies to fight for you.
skills.gameplay: Classic zombie army build. Stack strength with Baron for huge zombie count and life leech. Very tanky.

skills.name: Raise Spectre
skills.description: A summoner build that commands minions to fight for you.
skills.gameplay: Use powerful monster spectres like Syndicate Operatives or Redemption Sentries. Spectre choice defines the build.

skills.name: Absolution
skills.description: A hybrid spell/minion build using Absolution to summon and deal damage.
skills.gameplay: Cast Absolution to create Sentinel minions. Hybrid spell/minion build that scales both your damage and minion damage.

skills.name: Cremation
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Create geysers from corpses that deal fire damage. Good for stationary boss fights.

skills.name: Reap
skills.description: A physical spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Physical DoT that stacks blood charges for more damage. Pair with Exsanguinate.

skills.name: Vortex
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Instant cast Vortex for cold DoT. Layer with Cold Snap. Very tanky with ES and freeze. Easy to play.

skills.name: Essence Drain
skills.description: A chaos spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Cast Contagion then ED. DoT spreads through packs. Classic league starter.

skills.name: Ice Spear
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Long-range Ice Spears gain massive crit in second form. Excellent boss killer with proper positioning.

skills.name: Forbidden Rite
skills.description: A Cast on Crit build triggering Forbidden Rite with Cyclone attacks.
skills.gameplay: Spin to cast chaos projectiles. ES-based to handle life cost. Very expensive endgame build.

skills.name: Cold Snap
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Cold DoT build using Cold Snap's frenzy charge bypass. Often paired with Vortex for layered damage.

skills.name: Bane
skills.description: A chaos spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Apply multiple curses through Bane. DoT damage scales with linked curses.

skills.name: Creeping Frost
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Projectile cold DoT that chills ground. Synergizes with Vortex and Cold Snap for triple DoT layering.

skills.name: Eye of Winter
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Projectile that releases shards outward then inward. Use with Hydrosphere for shotgunning.

skills.name: Blade Vortex
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Cold-converted BV with Profane Bloom explosions. ES-based for endgame.

skills.name: Soulrend
skills.description: A chaos spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Homing chaos projectile with DoT and ES on hit. Good for mapping.

skills.name: Wintertide Brand
skills.description: A brand build that attaches cold brands to enemies.
skills.gameplay: Cold DoT brands that stack exposure. Very safe ES-based playstyle.

skills.name: Death Aura
skills.description: An aura-based build providing chaos damage through buffs.
skills.gameplay: Death's Oath grants Death Aura. Walk around as enemies die. Very relaxed playstyle.

skills.name: Detonate Dead
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong meta performance.
skills.gameplay: Cast Desecrate to create corpses, then Detonate Dead for massive ignite proliferation. Scales with corpse life.

skills.name: Arc
skills.description: A lightning spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Chain lightning that clears entire screens. Shocks proliferate for extra damage. Great mapper.

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Classic ignite Fireball. Proliferates massive ignites across packs. Good for mapping and bossing.

skills.name: Armageddon Brand
skills.description: A brand build that attaches fire brands to enemies.
skills.gameplay: Brands call down fire meteors. Good for ignite proliferation builds.

skills.name: Flame Wall
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Projectiles passing through Flame Wall gain added fire damage. Usually paired with a projectile skill.

skills.name: Explosive Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing fire damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Fire arrows that stack fuses then explode. Use ballista totems to stack faster.

skills.name: Discharge
skills.description: A elemental spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Consume all charges for massive elemental explosion. Requires charge generation.

skills.name: Herald of Thunder
skills.description: An autobomber build that clears screens automatically with herald effects.
skills.gameplay: Herald of Thunder chains through packs automatically. Just run and collect loot.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Spin to win with massive leech and overleech. Cull bosses at 20% life. Simple and effective for all content.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Slam that creates aftershocks. Less Duration makes aftershocks hit faster. Big AoE coverage.

skills.name: Flicker Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Flicker with massive leech and overleech. More sustainable but still chaotic.

skills.name: Lacerate
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Dual-wield or sword and shield bleed Lacerate. Gratuitous Violence makes bleeds explode.

skills.name: Bladestorm
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Create bladestorms that persist and bleed enemies. Good for stationary boss fights.

skills.name: Corrupting Fever
skills.description: A buff-focused build that enhances damage through Corrupting Fever.
skills.gameplay: Apply Corrupting Blood stacks with fast-hitting skills. Explosions clear packs.

skills.name: Reave
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Stack Reave for massive AoE. Vaal Reave instantly maxes stacks. Fast attack speed focused.

skills.name: Sunder
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Classic leveling skill. Wave travels along ground hitting enemies in a line.

skills.name: Double Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Fast-hitting strike skill for impale stacking. The Saviour creates mirage copies.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with strong defenses.
skills.gameplay: Impale-focused Cyclone with permanent Fortify. Tanky and consistent damage scaling.

skills.name: Spectral Helix
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing physical damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Spiraling projectile that hits many times. Excellent for leveling and impale stacking.

skills.name: Lightning Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on lightning damage with good damage.
ascendancy: First to Strike, Last to Fall
skills.gameplay: Tanky LS with permanent Fortify. Good balance of damage and defense.

skills.name: Explosive Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing fire damage from a distance.
ascendancy: First to Strike, Last to Fall
skills.gameplay: Tanky EA ballista build with permanent Fortify. Slower but safer.

skills.name: Righteous Fire
skills.description: A damage over time build dealing fire damage that burns enemies continuously.
skills.gameplay: Walk through enemies as RF burns them. Use Fire Trap for extra single target. Stack life regen and fire res to sustain RF.

skills.name: Boneshatter
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with strong defenses.
skills.gameplay: Stack Trauma for more damage, sustained by Juggernaut tankiness. Great stun build.

skills.name: Earthshatter
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Create spikes that explode with warcries. Big burst damage with proper cry rotation.

skills.name: Molten Strike
skills.description: A melee build focusing on fire damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Melee strike that releases fire projectiles. Excellent single target with enough balls.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Maximum damage Cyclone with Rage stacking and Berserk. Glass cannon playstyle with huge burst.

skills.name: Ground Slam
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Classic slam skill with wave AoE. Vaal version has massive range. Good league starter.

skills.name: Ice Crash
skills.description: A melee build focusing on cold damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Cold slam in three stages. Good freeze potential with high damage.

skills.name: Righteous Fire
skills.description: A damage over time build dealing fire damage that burns enemies continuously.
skills.gameplay: Fire-focused RF with added leech and fire damage. Totems benefit from ascendancy fire bonuses.

skills.name: Ancestral Warchief
skills.description: A totem build that places ancestral warchief totems to deal damage automatically.
skills.gameplay: Slam totems that deal melee damage. Place and let them do the work. Very safe playstyle.

skills.name: Ancestral Protector
skills.description: A totem build that places ancestral protector totems to deal damage automatically.
skills.gameplay: Fast-attacking totem. Usually paired with Warchief for buff stacking.

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Channel Incinerate for ramping fire damage. Release for big burst. Tanky with fire leech.

skills.name: Tectonic Slam
skills.description: A melee build focusing on fire damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Fire-converted slam with chance to burst. Consumes endurance charges for big hits.

skills.name: Infernal Blow
skills.description: A melee build focusing on fire damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Melee hits that make enemies explode. Satisfying chain reactions.

skills.name: Ice Nova
skills.description: A Cast on Crit build triggering Ice Nova with Cyclone attacks.
skills.gameplay: Spin with Cyclone to trigger Ice Nova on crits. Also cast Frostbolt from Cospri's for extra Novas.

skills.name: Blade Vortex
skills.description: A physical spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Maintain 10 blade stacks for constant damage. Pop packs with poison or explosions.

skills.name: Venom Gyre
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Throw returning blades that stack poison. Whirling Blades releases all caught blades.

skills.name: Blade Blast
skills.description: A physical spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Cast Bladefall then Blade Blast to detonate. Two-button combo with poison stacking.

skills.name: Ethereal Knives
skills.description: A physical spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Nova of physical projectiles. Good with poison scaling and projectile supports.

skills.name: Discharge
skills.description: A elemental spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: CoC Discharge with power charge generation. Very expensive and hard to gear.

skills.name: Essence Drain
skills.description: A chaos spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: ED/Contagion with Trickster's hybrid defenses. Ghost Shrouds add survivability.

skills.name: Toxic Rain
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: TR with Trickster speed and recovery. Ghost Shrouds help survivability.

skills.name: Blade Vortex
skills.description: A physical spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: BV with Trickster recovery and speed. Can convert to cold or stay physical.

skills.name: Caustic Arrow
skills.description: A ranged attack build dealing chaos damage from a distance.
skills.gameplay: Simple chaos DoT bow build. Create pools and move on.

skills.name: Soulrend
skills.description: A chaos spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Homing chaos projectiles with ES on hit. Good recovery with Trickster.

skills.name: Winter Orb
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Channel to build stages, then run while orb fires. Nostalgic mapping playstyle.

skills.name: Seismic Trap
skills.description: A trap build that throws seismic trap traps for burst damage.
skills.gameplay: Throw Seismic Traps that repeatedly hit. Excellent boss killer paired with Exsanguinate.

skills.name: Exsanguinate
skills.description: A trap build that throws exsanguinate traps for burst damage.
skills.gameplay: Physical DoT trap that chains between enemies. Great for mapping alongside Seismic.

skills.name: Lightning Trap
skills.description: A trap build that throws lightning trap traps for burst damage.
skills.gameplay: Classic crit trap build with shock proliferation. Good clear with chain or pierce.

skills.name: Pyroclast Mine
skills.description: A mine build using pyroclast mine mines for high single-target damage.
skills.gameplay: Place mines that release fireballs. Detonation chain for massive burst damage.

skills.name: Fire Trap
skills.description: A trap build that throws fire trap traps for burst damage.
skills.gameplay: Creates burning ground and ignites. Good for league start before transitioning.

skills.name: Icicle Mine
skills.description: A mine build using icicle mine mines for high single-target damage.
skills.gameplay: Cold mine with high crit potential. Freezes bosses with enough investment.

skills.name: Ice Trap
skills.description: A trap build that throws ice trap traps for burst damage.
skills.gameplay: Cold trap with chilling area. Defensive option with freeze potential.

skills.name: Righteous Fire
skills.description: A damage over time build dealing fire damage that burns enemies continuously.
skills.gameplay: Consecrated Ground provides massive regen. Can scale crit for bigger Fire Trap hits while RF handles clear.

skills.name: Spark
skills.description: A lightning spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Release sparks that bounce around. Great for enclosed spaces and indoor maps.

skills.name: Ball Lightning
skills.description: A lightning spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Spin with Cyclone to trigger Ball Lightning on crits. Requires high crit chance and attack speed.

skills.name: Storm Brand
skills.description: A brand build that attaches lightning brands to enemies.
skills.gameplay: Attach brands to enemies that pulse lightning. Brands jump to new targets on death.

skills.name: Flame Surge
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Deals extra damage against burning enemies. Pair with another fire skill to ignite first.

skills.name: Divine Ire
skills.description: A physical spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Channel to build stacks then release a massive beam. Good for bossing with timing.

skills.name: Penance Brand
skills.description: A brand build that attaches physical brands to enemies.
skills.gameplay: Brands build up energy then pulse for big damage. Requires timing for optimal burst.

skills.name: Wave of Conviction
skills.description: A physical spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Primarily used to apply exposure. Can be main skill with proper investment.

skills.name: Blazing Salvo
skills.description: A fire spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Fire projectiles that shotgun at close range. Good with mines for burst.

skills.name: Ball Lightning
skills.description: A lightning spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Place mines that cast Ball Lightning. Slow-moving projectile hits many times. Excellent boss DPS.

skills.name: Freezing Pulse
skills.description: A cold spell build with strong solid performance.
skills.gameplay: Totems fire freezing pulses that shatter frozen enemies. Safe totem playstyle with freeze for defense.

skills.name: Arc
skills.description: A lightning spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Totem build that places Arc totems to chain lightning. Safe and ranged playstyle with good clear.

skills.name: Holy Flame Totem
skills.description: A totem build that places holy flame totem totems to deal damage automatically.
skills.gameplay: Fire totems that create consecrated ground. Good league starter with steady damage.

skills.name: Shockwave Totem
skills.description: A totem build that places shockwave totem totems to deal damage automatically.
skills.gameplay: Totems pulse physical waves. Good clear but lower single target than spell totems.

skills.name: Searing Bond
skills.description: A totem build that places searing bond totems to deal damage automatically.
skills.gameplay: Totems connected by burning beams. Very safe but lower damage ceiling.

skills.name: Smite
skills.description: A melee build focusing on lightning damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Lightning melee that grants Smite aura to allies. Can be built as support or damage dealer.

skills.name: Herald of Purity
skills.description: A summoner build that commands minions to fight for you.
skills.gameplay: Summon Sentinel minions from Herald. Hit enemies to spawn more and maintain uptime.

skills.name: Herald of Agony
skills.description: A summoner build that commands minions to fight for you.
skills.gameplay: Keep the Agony Crawler at max virulence with poison hits. Very tanky mana guardian variant.

skills.name: Dominating Blow
skills.description: A summoner build that commands minions to fight for you.
skills.gameplay: Hit enemies to convert them into minions. Requires ramping up the army.

skills.name: Righteous Fire
skills.description: A damage over time build dealing fire damage that burns enemies continuously.
skills.gameplay: Hybrid RF taking best from multiple ascendancies. Very flexible gearing.

skills.name: Spark
skills.description: A lightning spell build with strong viable performance.
skills.gameplay: Aura stacking Spark with multiple ascendancy benefits. Very expensive endgame build.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: A melee build focusing on physical damage with good damage.
skills.gameplay: Hybrid Cyclone taking leech from Slayer and fortify from Champion.
